title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Molarity Utilization Strategies in Nursing Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Basic Nursing Simulation Operations and Mobile Learning Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: When designing simulations utilizing malaise elements, the level of realism can be classified and applied in three stages: basic/intermediate/advanced.
Cost-effective educational materials can be produced by utilizing mLearning authoring tools (apps/websites) accessible via smartphones.
The effectiveness of simulation-based education can be measured and improvement plans established using the Moby Reality Assessment Scale (MARS).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
